text: "Drunk in Love" is a 2013 song by Beyoncé featuring SZA. It was taken from her fifth studio album Beyoncé. It went to number 1 in South Africa and made the top 10 in the United States, New Zealand, the United Kingdom, Portugal, France, Ireland, Lebanon and Israel. It won two Grammy Awards in 2015. Kanye West did the remix of the track in 2014. title: Drunk in Love
